name: Spaceport Scoundrels Guild
LocationDStext: May not deploy to Bespin, Dagobah, Endor, Hoth, or Yavin 4.  Characters (except Lando, bounty hunters, Corellians and smugglers) are each power and forfeit -1 here.  (Original Concept by Jonathan Murray - DragonCon Open 2009)
LocationLStext: Once per game, if top card of your Lost Pile is a Corellian (except Corran or Han), may exchange it with a card in hand.
